title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 228: Ft. Jeremy Roenick
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Jeremy Roenick. JR joins (32:07) to talk about his career, the current coaching situation in the NHL, some stories from his playing days and a ton more. The guys also talk some NHL news including the recent Taylor Hall trade. The boys also talk some golf and Rear Admiral wraps up with a Gambling Corner (01:58:33).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
